title: Italian style bread
ingredients: ['310ml water', '560g strong white flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons dried milk powder (optional)', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons sugar', '2 teaspoons dried basil', '2 teaspoons dried oregano', '3 tablespoons tomato puree', '7g dried active baking yeast', '2 to 4 tablespoons sliced olives']
